name: Take a Chance (Yeo Yeo)
description:
A local multiplayer party game in which you hold onto a bomb to gain points, but not too long or it'll explode.

This game is designed for 4 players, but if you have less you can still play by having someone control more than one player such as a 2 player game with each person controlling 2 characters each or a 3 player game with 1 person controlling 2 characters. If you're really lonely, you can control all 4 characters by yourself but that won't be as interesting.
